#summary How to use the current release.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The current version only supports iterating over Perforce labels.  It is assumed you've installed Maven 2 and JDK 1.6 and setup the M2_HOME and JAVA_HOME environment variables.

It also assumes you've setup the connection information for the sonar maven plugin as defined here http://docs.codehaus.org/display/SONAR/Install+Sonar#InstallSonar-Step5ConfigureMaven2

= Details =

Usage
 * _*{{{java -jar sonar-replay.jar [-props <properties file>]}}}*_
 * properties can be defined as system properties (-D...) or within an optional properties file.

Supported properties:

{{{

# Required perforce connection information, p4host and p4port should be replaced with values for your env
p4.url=p4java://p4host:p4port
p4.user=example
p4.password=example

# optional, excludes source files from the Sonar reports
sonar.exclusions=**/*Dummy.java,**/Dummy2.java

# The path to your maven settings file, optional and defaults to this
m2.settings=${user.home}/.m2/settings.xml

# Filter to a specific timespan to process, optional
p4.interval.start=2007-03-05
p4.interval.end=2010-02-26

# The actual depots to process
p4.file.specs=//depot1/...,//depot2/...

# Actual label filters to pass to p4 commands
p4.label.name.filters=label1-*,label2-*

# Post-filter if you need regex filtering.  Group 1 is used to set the property 'build.number'
p4.label.filter=(?:label1|label2)-(\\d+[.\\d\\-a-z]*)
}}}
